name: part_009
file: tmp_≪-KAGURA- Dance of the Gods 3D LIVE≫ Hakos Baelz Birthday 2025 + ANNOUNCEMENTS! #BaeDDay2025 [viPlIHvk724]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: Hakos Baelz introduces her Birthday Celebration 2025 merchandise set.
Baelz presents the first item: the KAGURA Double-Layered Acrylic Block, featuring art by Mika Pikazo.
Baelz presents the second item: The Rat Sack II Duffel Bag, designed for dance and travel.
Baelz presents the third item: The DripTaro Necklace, featuring various charms.
Baelz introduces the fourth item: the KAGURA Keychain, exclusive to the full set.
Baelz discusses the full set purchase bonus: a postcard, with limited versions being hand-signed.
Baelz highlights an additional full set bonus: a Hololive Official Card Game PR card.
